text:
Hey guys,

I just tried to send 2x €150 on Coinbase to another Bitcoin address.

I made sure to type correctly the amounts but afterwards I realised Coinbase only sent 2 x €25,- and I had to pay each time about €10,- in fees.

Anyone had experience with this? Please be careful guys since Coinbase seems bugged today.

(I contacted their support today but still no reply so far)
title: Ask HN: Is Coinbase bugged?
